name: Cozy Critters (hulkmeistercoder)
description:
This is a repost under my account for my first game jam ever, Seattle Indies Slow Jam 2021!

See the original post here: https://r0nnie.itch.io/cozy-critters.

The game was made using:
* Unreal Engine 4
* Blender

This project was horrendously over-scoped and overly complicated with features ranging from procedural generation to utility AI, and game mechanics focusing on creature behavior and upkeep. All the wrong choices for even a two week game jam. Nonetheless, it was a great learning experience, giving me more food for thought on how to grow a jam project, and connecting me with a good friend and artist, Paul Carroll.
